segments.text: Okay , well I ’ m sure you have a number of questions to ask me regarding the position .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , well Miss Childs did give mean overview of the position over the phone , but there were some details I ’ d like to clarify .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well feel free to ask me anything , and I ’ ll try to fill in the details .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could I first ask about the remuneration package ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course . That's quite an important point , isn ’ t it ? As a junior sub editor we offer a starting salary of 150,000 HK dollars per annum . This doesn ’ t include a generous housing allowance al
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand . And are there other bonuses included ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , apart from full health insurance we do offer a company staff bonus scheme linked to readership numbers . But we could go through all the details of that at a later date .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , Mr . Parsons , I am flexible when it comes to salary . The opportunity to work in Hong Kong for you is the most important thing for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excellent.Well , what other questions do you have Rebecca ?
segments.speaker: S1
